member.name: T:PostmarkDotNet.IPostmarkClient
member.summary: Defines the contract for the Postmark API.

member.name: M:PostmarkDotNet.IPostmarkClient.BeginSendMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a message through the Postmark API. All email addresses must be valid, and the sender must be a valid sender signature according to Postmark. To obtain a valid sender signature, log in to Postmark and navigate to: http://postmarkapp.com/signatures.
member.param: An email address for a sender.
An email address for a recipient.
The message subject line.
The message body.
member.returns: A with details about the transaction.

member.name: M:PostmarkDotNet.IPostmarkClient.BeginSendMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Sends a message through the Postmark API. All email addresses must be valid, and the sender must be a valid sender signature according to Postmark. To obtain a valid sender signature, log in to Postmark and navigate to: http://postmarkapp.com/signatures.
member.param: An email address for a sender
An email address for a recipient
The message subject line
The message body
A collection of additional mail headers to send with the message
member.returns: A with details about the transaction

member.name: M:PostmarkDotNet.IPostmarkClient.BeginSendMessage(PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkMessage)
member.summary: Sends a message through the Postmark API. All email addresses must be valid, and the sender must be a valid sender signature according to Postmark. To obtain a valid sender signature, log in to Postmark and navigate to: http://postmarkapp.com/signatures.

member.name: M:PostmarkDotNet.IPostmarkClient.BeginSendMessages(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkMessage})

member.param: A prepared message batch.
